job.title: Software Engineer I

job.description: Join a team recognized for leadership innovation and diversitybrbrHoneywell changes the way the world worksbrbrFor more than 130 years weve solved the toughest customer challenges inclusion diversity and driving a performance culture that values integrity and ethicsbrbrAre you ready to help us make the futurebrbrWe lead with software and innovationbrbrWhether were turning mustard seeds into fuel creating quantum algorithms or making taxis fly our software engineering team is home to the worlds leading technological talentbrbrWe want software engineers who not only have a solid foundation in coding development designing testing and even hacking but who also have a passion for empowering the world and making it a better place for everyone  today and tomorrowbrbrJoin a team that designs develops and integrates highly complex software applications within Honeywell Aerospace You will be an active and integral member of a team to achieve the completion of goals You
